title: Dissociated member's power to bind the limited
context: [ยง428-703] Dissociated member&rsquo;s power to bind the limited liability company. Provided that the dissociation does not result in a dissolution and winding up of a limited liability company&rsquo;s business, for two years after a member dissociates from the company, the company, including a surviving company under part IX, shall be bound by an act of the dissociated member which would have bound the company under section 428-301 before dissociation only if at the time of entering into the transaction the other party: (1) Reasonably believed that the dissociated member was then a member; (2) Did not have notice of the member&rsquo;s dissociation; and (3) Is not deemed to have had notice under section 428-704. [L 1996, c 92, pt of ยง1]
